thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sanoma To Sell Its Belgian Women’s Magazine Portfolio

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sanoma To Sell Its Belgian Women’s Magazine Portfolio
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - SANOMA OYJ:
* SANOMA INTENDS TO SELL ITS BELGIAN WOMEN’S MAGAZINE PORTFOLIO
* SANOMA INTENDS TO SELL ITS BELGIAN WOMEN’S MAGAZINE PORTFOLIO
* ‍ENTERPRISE VALUE OF DIVESTED ASSETS IS EUR 34 MILLION, REPRESENTING AN EBIT MULTIPLE OF 5.5​
* ‍NET SALES OF DIVESTED BUSINESS WERE APPROX. EUR 78 MILLION IN 2017 (PRELIMINARY FIGURE)​
* ‍TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO BE CLOSED BY END OF Q2 OF 2018.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
